Title: Malladi Brothers impressed with their swara sancharas.
Content: The concluding part of the ARTery and Hamsadhwani Independence Day programme was a concert of Malladi Brothers. They began with a Sanskrit verse on ‘Hindustan’ leading to the sedate Anandabhairavi
Author: G. Swaminathan
Description: The concluding part of the ARTery and Hamsadhwani Independence Day programme was a concert of Malladi Brothers. They began with a Sanskrit verse on ‘Hindustan’ leading to the sedate Anandabhairavi
